testsuite.name: ClientTest
testsuite.system-out: Hi, shukla Chat Room Command Options: ?: show command line options login: CONNECT_MESSAGE to the server logoff: sends a DISCONNECT_MESSAGE to the server who: sends a QUERY_CONNECTED_USERS to the server @user: sends a DIRECT_MESSAGE to the specified user to the server @all: sends a BROADCAST_MESSAGE to the server, to be sent to all users connected !user: sends a SEND_INSULT message to the server, to be sent to the specified user Hi, shukla Chat Room Command Options: ?: show command line options login: CONNECT_MESSAGE to the server logoff: sends a DISCONNECT_MESSAGE to the server who: sends a QUERY_CONNECTED_USERS to the server @user: sends a DIRECT_MESSAGE to the specified user to the server @all: sends a BROADCAST_MESSAGE to the server, to be sent to all users connected !user: sends a SEND_INSULT message to the server, to be sent to the specified user Hi, shukla Chat Room Command Options: ?: show command line options login: CONNECT_MESSAGE to the server logoff: sends a DISCONNECT_MESSAGE to the server who: sends a QUERY_CONNECTED_USERS to the server @user: sends a DIRECT_MESSAGE to the specified user to the server @all: sends a BROADCAST_MESSAGE to the server, to be sent to all users connected !user: sends a SEND_INSULT message to the server, to be sent to the specified user Hi, shukla Chat Room Command Options: ?: show command line options login: CONNECT_MESSAGE to the server logoff: sends a DISCONNECT_MESSAGE to the server who: sends a QUERY_CONNECTED_USERS to the server @user: sends a DIRECT_MESSAGE to the specified user to the server @all: sends a BROADCAST_MESSAGE to the server, to be sent to all users connected !user: sends a SEND_INSULT message to the server, to be sent to the specified user
